Package index

All functions

cleanCtmat()
Filter a matrix based on expression levels
create_combined_matrix()
Get a list of matrices with specified barcodes and genes
create_pseudo_bulk()
Create pseudobulks
do_cpm_log()
CPM normalizes a matrix and log-transforms it
generate_cell_types()
Generate cell type specific matrices with unique column names
generate_cell_types_w_barcodes()
Generate cell type specific matrices with barcodes
limma_dge()
CPMLog normalize and perform DEA
load_w_new_col()
Load dataset with new column names
perform_DGE()
TMM Normalize and perform DEA
